data.title: Our Brand
data.text:
Exchange Policy:

K1 will be happy to Exchange your item if you are not satisfied with it or you need a different size. All items must be returned in their original packaging in new/unused condition. We cannot refund any shipping charges but will gladly pay to ship your new-exchanged item to you at no additional cost. All items must be exchanged within 45 days of the ship date.

Refunds:

For refunds on items with no exchange please contact us at sales@k1brand.com. In most cases we will accept returns for 45 days after the date the items were shipped to the buyer. All items must be returned in their original packaging in new, unused condition. Sorry, shipping and handling fees are non-refundable. Please allow 1-2 business days for the processing of the return.
